title: Piedmont Park Explorer
shortDescription: Discover the best spots in Piedmont Park with this exciting scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: This scavenger hunt will take you through the beautiful Piedmont Park, exploring scenic locations, historic monuments, and popular local spots. Perfect for a fun day out in Atlanta!

missions.title: The Legacy Fountain
missions.shortDescription: Start your adventure at the iconic Legacy Fountain.
missions.hint: Find the fountain that features colorful water displays during the summer.

missions.title: The Meadow
missions.shortDescription: Head to the large open meadow, a popular spot for picnics and events.
missions.hint: Look for the area where people often gather to play frisbee or have a picnic.

missions.title: Park Tavern
missions.shortDescription: Visit the historic Park Tavern located near the edge of the park.
missions.hint: This spot offers great views of the Midtown skyline and is known for its beer garden.

missions.title: Lake Clara Meer
missions.shortDescription: End your hunt with a peaceful walk around Lake Clara Meer.
missions.hint: This lake is a central feature of the park, often surrounded by ducks and geese.
